main.bio: My name is Sruthi, I'm a Full Stack ReactJS Developer. Currently I'm working at Mr Cooper, a US based finance company while also freelancing.

resume.skillmessage: I have a good command over data and been part of lot of open source projects. I have 1+ years of experience in web development.

testimonials.text: To catch up so quickly and to be par with the pace at which we operate, definitely shows your willingness and passion to learn more every passing day.Way to go!!Thank you for adapting so quickly!
